title: Hot public holiday expected for Sydney and Brisbane after record rain for parts of NSW and Queensland in September
summary: Warm weather has arrived in New South Wales and Queensland after recent heavy rainfall that set daily records in over a dozen locations. The deluges caused significant impacts across the regions. Residents are now experiencing a shift to milder temperatures following the intense rain.

title: Trump authorizes national guard deployment to Chicago, White House says, as border patrol there shoots woman
summary: Illinois Governor JB Pritzker has criticized the growing aggression towards citizens and residents in the state. He claims that the administration's actions reflect an alarming increase in hostility. Pritzker emphasizes the need to address and counter these aggressive measures.

summary: The Melbourne Theatre Company's production of Anne-Louise Sarks' adaptation of the 1938 novel offers rich and compelling performances. However, certain elements of the production do not fully resonate with the audience. Overall, it presents a mixed response to the classic story.
